transfer.description: Transfers tokens to a specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another, using an allowance mechanism.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the spender's allowance for the owner's tokens.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the spender's allowance for the owner's tokens.

approve.description: Approves a spender to transfer tokens on the owner's behalf.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to transfer on behalf of an owner.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one account to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when the allowance of a spender is set by the owner.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the mainchain gateway address.

mainchainGateway.description: Returns the address of the mainchain gateway.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specific address.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used in the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.
